name: Flows <- Present User Flows and Annotate your Design
description:
Directional arrows to present user flows (variants edition)


  1. Copy this frame in your project or use the file as library
  2. Show Assets (⎇2) and insert a component on your canvas
  3. Scale (K) the instance to your desire thickness
  4. Color it to your palette
  5. Copy, resize, rotate, flip as needed to illustrate your flow
  6. Change the variants (type, line, caps) as needed in the Design panel.


If you have any questions or comments: ux@jpcyr.com
